headline: Eaton Reshapes Portfolio Toward Electrification And AI Data Center Growth
summary: Eaton (NYSE:ETN) is spinning off its Mobility business to concentrate on its electrical and aerospace segments. The company has completed acquisitions in energy solutions tied to electrification and digitalization trends. Eaton entered a new partnership with Flexnode focused on scalable, high performance data center infrastructure. For you as an investor, this shift places Eaton more directly in the path of demand for power management, grid resiliency, and aerospace systems. The spin-off of...

headline: Forgent Power Solutions: Does It Have The Power?
summary: Forgent Power Solutions IPO at $8.2B amid AI-driven power demand. Margins lag peers like Vertiv and Eaton. See why I remain on the sidelines for FPS.
